Sloka: द्वविमौ ग्रसते भूमिः सर्पो बिलशयानिवं।                            राजानं चाविरोद्धारं ब्राह्मणं चाप्रवासिनम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: These two swallow the earth, the snake, like the beds of the cave.The king and the brahmins were contradictory

Sloka: काष्ठपाषाण धातुनां कृत्वा भावेन सेवनम्।                                   श्रद्धया च तथा सिद्धिस्तस्य विष्णोः प्रसादतः॥
EnglishTranslation: Consumption with the sense of wood and stone metals.By faith and by the grace of Visnu his perfection.

Sloka: दर्शनध्यानसंस्पर्शैर्मत्स्यी कूर्मी च पक्षिणि।                                    शिशु पालयते नित्यं तथा सज्जनसंगतिः॥

Sloka: लुब्धमर्थेन गृह्णीयात्स्तब्धमञ्जलिकर्मणा।                                   मूर्खश्छन्दानुरोधेन यथार्थवादेन पण्डितम्॥
EnglishTranslation: He should take the greedy meaning by the action of stupidity.A fool is a wise man by the request of the chanda and by the real argument.

Sloka: पंचेन्द्रियस्य मर्त्यस्य छिद्रं चेदेकमिन्द्रियम् ।                            ततोऽस्य स्त्रवति प्रज्ञा दृतेः पात्रादिवोदकम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: If there is a hole in the five senses, the same sense is the same.Then the intelligence of the Lord is discharged from the water from the water from the vessel.

Sloka: कस्य दोषः कुले नास्ति व्याधिना को न पीडितः।                                   व्यसनं केन न प्राप्तं कस्य सौख्यं निरन्तरम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Who has no fault in the family and who is not afflicted with diseaseWho has not attained adversity and whose happiness is continuous?

Sloka: कामधेनुगुणा विद्या ह्ययकाले फलदायिनी।                                   प्रवासे मातृसदृशा विद्या गुप्तं धनं स्मृतम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Knowledge is the quality of desire and gives fruit in the time of the time.Knowledge like a mother in exile is said to be secret wealth.

Sloka: बन्धन्य विषयासङ्गः मुक्त्यै निर्विषयं मनः।                                     मन एव मनुष्याणां कारणं बन्धमोक्षयोः॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is devoid of objects for liberation, attachment to objects.The mind itself is the cause of bondage and liberation for men.

Sloka: जीवन्तं मृतवन्मन्ये देहिनं धर्मवर्जितम्।                                     मृतो धर्मेण संयुक्तो दीर्घजीवी न संशयः॥
EnglishTranslation: I think that the embodied is alive as a dead man is devoid of righteousness.He died with righteousness and was undoubtedly a long life.

Sloka: मनः शीघ्रतरं बातात् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is faster than the bat.

Sloka: शब्दमात्रात् न भीतव्यम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: It should not be afraid of the sound alone.

Sloka: शत्रवोऽपि हितायैव विवदन्तः परस्परम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Even the enemies were disputing with each other for the sake of their welfare

Sloka: छात्रैः परिश्रमेण पठितव्यम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Students should read with hard work.

Sloka: प्राप्नोति वै वित्तमसद्बलेन नित्योत्त्थानात् प्रज्ञया पौरुषेण।                            न त्वेव सम्यग् लभते प्रशंसां न वृत्तमाप्नोति महाकुलानाम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He obtains wealth by the strength of goodness, by eternal rise, wisdom and manhood.He does not get perfectly appreciated by the great families of great families.

Sloka: मनसा चिन्तितं कार्यं वाचा नैव प्रकाशयेत्।                                    मन्त्रेण रक्षयेद् गूढं कार्य चापि नियोजयेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The work thought of the mind should not be revealed by words.With the mantra one should protect the mystery and the task should also be employed.

Sloka: आक्रोशपरिवादाभ्यां विहिंसन्त्यबुधा बुधान्।                            वक्ता पापमुपादत्ते क्षममाणो विमुच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: The ignorant, the wise, violate the wise in anger.A speaker includes sin and is freed from the forgiveness.

Sloka: गतानुगतिको लोकः न लोक़ः पारमार्थिकः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The world of the past is not the transcendental world.

Sloka: मातृवत् परदारेषु परद्रव्याणि लोष्ठवत्।                                    आत्मवत् सर्वभूतानि यः पश्यति सः पण्डितः॥
EnglishTranslation: Like a mother in other wives and other things like a lip.He who sees all beings as the Self is a wise man.

Sloka: असमाहितस्य वृतिनर विद्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is a man who has no concentration.

Sloka: नव्यसनपरस्य कार्यावाप्तिः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The attainment of the work of the newly addicted.

Sloka: अस्तयभाषणं पापं वर्तते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Speaking of the situation is a sin.

Sloka: प्रियवाक्यप्रदानेन सर्वे तुष्यन्ति मानवाः ।                                 तस्मात् तदेव वक्तव्यं वचने का दरिद्रता ॥
EnglishTranslation: All human beings are pleased with the giving of pleasant wordsTherefore, what is the poverty in words?

Sloka: पितरि प्रीतिमापन्ने प्रीयन्ते सर्वदेवताः ॥
EnglishTranslation: All the demigods are pleased when they are pleased with their father.

Sloka: अनिर्वेदः श्रियो मूलं लाभस्य च शुभस्य च।                            महान्  भवत्यनिर्विण्णः सुखं चानन्त्यमश्नुते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Anirveda is the root of prosperity, profit and good.He becomes great and undisturbed and enjoys infinite happiness.

Sloka: अकार्यकरणाद् भीतः कार्याणान्च विवर्जनात् ।                            अकाले मन्त्रभेदाच्च येन माद्देन्न तत् पिबेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: He is afraid of doing what he does not workOne should not give food to the one who gives me the difference of mantras prematurely.

Sloka: मूर्खाः यत्र न पूज्यन्ते धान्यं यत्र सुसंचितम् ।                                   दाम्पत्योः कलहो नास्ति तत्र श्री स्वयमागता॥
EnglishTranslation: Where fools are not worshipped, grain is well accumulated.There is no quarrel between the couple and the prosperity itself has come.

Sloka: यस्य चित्तं द्रवीभूतं कृपया सर्वजन्तुषु ।                                      तस्य ज्ञानेन मोक्षेण किं जटा भसमलेपनैः॥
EnglishTranslation: His mind is liquid, by His mercy, in all living beings.What is the use of his knowledge and liberation?

Sloka: कुराजराज्येन कृतः प्रजासुखं कुमित्रमित्रेण कुतोऽभिनिवृत्तिः।                                   कुदारदारैश्च कुतो गृहे रतिः कृशिष्यमध्यापयतः कुतो यशः॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is the happiness of a bad friend and a friend who has been made by a bad kingdom?Where is the attraction in the house of the victims of the victims and where is the reputation of the lean person?

Sloka: न संसार भयं ज्ञानवताम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no fear of the world for the wise.

Sloka: किं किं न साधयति कल्पलतेव विद्या ॥
EnglishTranslation: What doesn’t it achieve, just as knowledge does it go to the creeper of a Kalpa?

Sloka: सुखार्थिनः कुतो विद्या नास्ति विद्यार्थिनः सुखम्।                             सुखार्थी वा त्यजेत् विद्यां विद्यार्थी वा त्यजेत् सुखम्॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is knowledge for those seeking happiness, there is no happiness for the seeker of knowledge?One who seeks happiness should abandon knowledge or one who seeks knowledge should abandon happiness.

Sloka: गुरुरग्निर्द्विजातीनां वर्णानां ब्राह्मणो गुरुः।                                  पतिरेव गुरुः स्त्रीणां सर्वस्याभ्यगतो गुरुः॥
EnglishTranslation: The teacher is the fire of the twice-born, and the Brahmin is the teacher of the castes.The husband alone is the preceptor of all women and the preceptor has come to him.

Sloka: न निर्मिता केन न दृष्टपूर्वा न श्रूयते हेममयी कुरङ्गी ।                                     तथाऽपि तृष्णा रघुनन्दनस्य विनाशकाले विपरीतबुद्धिः॥

Sloka: यस्य बुद्धिर्बलं तस्य निर्बुद्धेस्तु कुतो बलम्  ॥
EnglishTranslation: Where is the strength of one who has the strength of his intelligence?

Sloka: राजा राष्ट्रकृतं पापं राज्ञः पापं पुरोहितः।                                  भर्ता च स्त्रीकृतं पापं शिष्य पाप गुरुस्तथा॥
EnglishTranslation: The king is the sin committed by the nation and the priest is the sin of the king.A husband who committed a woman by a woman is a disciple and a sinner is a sinner.

Sloka: आत्मज्ञानं समारम्भः तितिक्षा धर्मनित्यता ।                            यमर्थान्नापकर्षन्ति स वै पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Self-knowledge is the beginning of patience, patience and religion.A person who does not pull away from the material world is called a learned man.

Sloka: सर्वे चण्डस्य विभ्यति ॥
EnglishTranslation: All of them are afraid of the fierce one.

Sloka: आर्यकर्मणि रज्यन्ते भूतिकर्माणि कुर्वते।                            हितं च नाभ्यसूयन्ति पण्डिता भरतर्षभ ॥
EnglishTranslation: They rejoice in the noble deeds and perform the rituals of prosperity.O best of the Bharatas, learned men do not envy for their welfare.

Sloka: न हृष्यत्यात्मसम्माने नावमानेन  तप्यते।                              गाङ्गो ह्रद ईवाक्षोभ्यो यः स पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He does not rejoice in self-respect nor tormented by insult.The Ganges, which is like a lake, is called a learned man.

Sloka: बह्वाश्र्चर्या हि मेदनी ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are many hymns of the earth.

Sloka: तावद् भयेषु भेतव्यं यावद्भयमनागतम्।                                    आगतं तु भयं दृष्टवा प्रहर्तव्यमशङ्कया॥
EnglishTranslation: Fear in fears until fear has come.Seeing the fear that had come, he should be stricken with fear.

Sloka: दुर्जनेषु च सर्पेषु वरं सर्पो न दुर्जनः।                                  सर्पो दंशति कालेन दुर्जनस्तु पदे-पदे ॥
EnglishTranslation: And among the wicked snakes the snake is not evil.A snake bites a snake in time, but a wicked man is at every step.

Sloka: नाक्रोशी स्यात्रावमानी परस्य मित्रद्रोही नोत निचोपसेवी।                           न चाभिमानी न च हीनवृत्तों रुक्षां वाचं रुषतीं वर्जयीत॥
EnglishTranslation: Nakroshi would be a Ravamani, a betrayer of friends, not a chope-server.He should not be proud, nor deficient in his conduct, nor should he avoid harsh words, anger.

Sloka: स्वमर्थं यः परित्यज्य परार्थमनुतिष्ठति।                          मिथ्या चरति मित्रार्थे यश्च मूढः स उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who abandons his own interest and abides for the sake of others.He who walks falsely for the sake of his friend is called a fool

Sloka: रोहते सायकैर्विद्धं वनं परशुना हतम्।                            वाचा दुरुक्तं बीभत्सं न संरोहति वाक्क्षतम्  ॥
EnglishTranslation: The forest shot by the arrows grows and killed by an axe.A terrible thing that is difficult to speak does not grow up in speech.

Sloka: लालनाद् बहवो दोषास्ताडनाद् बहवो गुणाः।                                   तस्मात्पुत्रं च शिष्यं च ताडयेन्न तु लालयेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are many faults from nurturing many virtuesTherefore one should beat his son and disciple, but should not nurture.

Sloka: एक: पापानि कुरुते फलं भुङ्क्ते महाजन:।                            भोक्तारो विप्रमुच्यन्ते कर्ता दोषेण लिप्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: One commits sins and the great man enjoys the fruits.The enjoyers are released from the brāhmaṇas and the doer is tainted by the fault.

Sloka: देहाभिमानगलिते ज्ञानेन परमात्मनः।                                   यत्र यत्र मनो याति तत्र तत्र समाधयः॥
EnglishTranslation: By the knowledge of the body's pride, the Supreme Self.Wherever the mind goes, there are meditations.

Sloka: सिंहादेकं बकादेकं शिक्षेच्चत्वारि कुक्कुटात्।                                  वायसात्पञ्च शिक्षेच्च षट् शुनस्त्रीणि गर्दभात्॥
EnglishTranslation: One should learn one of the lions and one of the four chickens.From the crow he should learn six dogs from the donkey and from the donkey.

Sloka: कुपुत्रो जायेत क्वचिदपि कुमाता न भवति ॥
EnglishTranslation: A bad son is born and a bad mother is never born.

Sloka: किन्नु मे स्यादिदं कृत्वा किन्नु मे स्यादकुर्वतः ।                            इति कर्माणि सञ्चिन्त्य कुरयड् कुर्याद् वा पुरुषो न वा॥
EnglishTranslation: What can I do for me and what will I do for I do not do it?Thinking thus, he should perform the Kurayad, whether he is a man or not.

Sloka: प्रायेण श्रीमतां लोके भोक्तुं शक्तिर्न विद्यते।                            जीर्यन्त्यपि हि काष्ठानि दरिद्राणां महीपते ॥
EnglishTranslation: There is almost no power to enjoy in the world of the rich.O King, even the wood of the poor are old, even if they are old.

Sloka: अनागतं यः कुरुते स शोभते ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who does what has not come is beautiful.

Sloka: सेवाधर्मः परमगहनो ॥
EnglishTranslation: The religion of service is the supreme deep.

Sloka: एकमेवाक्षरं यस्तु गुरुः शिष्यं प्रबोधयेत् ।                                 पृथिव्यां नास्ति तद्द्रव्यं यद् दत्त्वा चाऽनृणी भवेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: The teacher who awakens the disciple in the same syllable.There is nothing on earth that is not debt to give it to the person who gives it to him.

EnglishTranslation: What is the use of employment in the place of the wisdom?

Sloka: मन एव मनुष्याणां कारणं बन्धमोक्षयोः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The mind is the cause of bondage and liberation for human beings.

Sloka: धनिकः श्रोत्रियो राजा नदी वैद्यस्तु पञ्चमः।                                   पञ्च यत्र न विद्यन्ते न तत्र दिवसे वसेत ॥
EnglishTranslation: The fifth is the rich, the listener, the king, the river, the physician.Where there are no five, one should not live in a day.

Sloka: स्वभावेन हि तुष्यन्ति देवाः सत्पुरुषाः पिताः।                                    ज्ञातयः स्नानपानाभ्यां वाक्यदानेन पण्डिताः॥
EnglishTranslation: For by nature the gods are pleased with the gods and fathers.The wise men by giving words by bathing and drinking words

Sloka: किं कुलेन विशालेन विद्याहीने च देहिनाम्।                                    दुष्कुलं चापि विदुषी देवैरपि हि पूज्यते॥
EnglishTranslation: What is the use of a vast family and without knowledge of the embodied.Even a learned man is worshiped even by the gods

Sloka: पितृपैतामहं राज्यं प्राप्तवान् स्वेन कर्मणा।                            वायुरभ्रमिवासाद्य भ्रंशयत्यनये स्थितः ॥
EnglishTranslation: I have attained the kingdom by my father and grandfather.The wind blows in the sky and moves away from the sky.

Sloka: एकोऽपि गुणवान् पुत्रो निर्गुणैश्च शतैर्वरः।                                    एकश्चन्द्रस्तमो हन्ति न च ताराः सहस्रशः॥
EnglishTranslation: A single virtuous son is a boon by hundreds of hundreds of virtues.One moon kills darkness and not thousands of stars.

Sloka: जनिता चोपनेता च यस्तु विद्यां प्रयच्छति।                                   अन्नदाता भयत्राता पञ्चैता पितरः स्मृताः॥
EnglishTranslation: He who gives knowledge to the mother and the leader.These five fathers are considered to be the giver of food to fear

Sloka: प्रवृत्तवाक् विचित्रकथ ऊहवान् प्रतिभानवान्।                            आशु ग्रन्थस्य वक्ता च यः स पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: The initiated speech was strange and talented.He who is quick to speak of the text is called a learned man.

Sloka: तृणं ब्रह्मविद स्वर्गं तृणं शूरस्य जीवनम्।                                  जिमाक्षस्य तृणं नारी निःस्पृहस्य तृणं जगत्॥
EnglishTranslation: The grass of the Brahma-knowing is heaven, and grass is the life of a hero.A woman who has no desire for the sake of Jimaksha is the world of grass

Sloka: अनन्तशास्त्रं बहुलाश्च विद्या अल्पं च कालो बहुविघ्नता च ।                                     आसारभूतं तदुपासनीयं हंसो यथा क्षीरमिवाम्बुमध्यात्॥

Sloka: दुर्बलाश्रयो दुःखमावहति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Weak sadness is due to sorrow.

Sloka: न विश्चसेदविश्चस्ते विश्चस्ते नातिविश्चसेत्।                            विश्चासाद् भयमुत्पन्न मुलान्यपि निकृन्तति ॥
EnglishTranslation: He will not be victimized and he will not be able to escape.From the scene, the roots of the trees are cut off from the roots.

Sloka: अश्रुतश्च समुत्रद्धो दरिद्रश्य महामनाः।                            अर्थांश्चाकर्मणा प्रेप्सुर्मूढ इत्युच्यते बुधैः ॥
EnglishTranslation: And unheard of, he was filled with the poor and great-minded.A person who desires wealth by inaction is called a fool by the wise.

EnglishTranslation: By means of the means of victory, the sight of the Lord is not the source of the universe.

Sloka: उद्योगे नास्ति दारिद्रयं जपतो नास्ति पातकम्।                                      मौनेन कलहो नास्ति जागृतस्य च न भयम्॥
EnglishTranslation: There is no poverty in industry, and there is no sin in chanting.There is no quarrel by silence and there is no fear of awakening.

Sloka: दारिद्रयनाशनं दानं शीलं दुर्गतिनाशनम्।                                  अज्ञानतानाशिनी प्रज्ञा भावना भयनाशिनी॥
EnglishTranslation: It destroys poverty, charity, character and destruction of misfortune.Wisdom destroys ignorance and destroys emotions and fear.

Sloka: सहायास्तादृशा एव यादृशी भवितव्यता ॥
EnglishTranslation: The same is true of the same as the help of the Lord.

Sloka: त्रिविधं नरकस्येदं द्वारम नाशनमात्मन: ।                            काम: क्रोधस्तथा लोभस्तस्मादेतत्त्रयं त्यजेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: There are three kinds of hell, and this is the gateway to destroy the self.Lust, anger and greed are the three elements, and therefore one should abandon these three.

Sloka: कः कालः कानि मित्राणि को देशः को व्ययागमोः।                                   कस्याहं का च मे शक्तिरिति चिन्त्यं मुहुर्मुहुः॥
EnglishTranslation: What time, what are the friends, what is the country, what is the expense?Whose I am I and what is my power?' I wonder again and again.

Sloka: उत्पन्नपश्चात्तापस्य बुद्धिर्भवति यादृशी ।                                      तादृशी यदि पूर्वा स्यात्कस्य स्यान्न महोदयः ॥
EnglishTranslation: The kind of intelligence that has arisen afterwards is the same.If such a former is the former, who will not be a great man?

Sloka: हिंसाबबलमसाधूनां राज्ञा दण्डविधिर्बलम्।                            शुश्रुषा तु बलं स्त्रीणां क्षमा गुणवतां बलम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The king's punishment is the strength of violence and strengthThe strength of women is the strength of women and the strength of virtuous men

Sloka: मूर्खस्तु परिहर्तव्यः प्रत्यक्षो द्विपदः पशुः।                                 भिनत्ति वाक्यशूलेन अदृश्ययं कण्टकं यथा ॥
EnglishTranslation: The fool should be avoided, the direct two-legged animal.It breaks through the spear of words, just as the thorn is invisible.

Sloka: कर्मणा मनसा वाचा यदभीक्षणं निषेवते।                            तदेवापहरत्येनं तस्मात् कल्याणमाचरेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: By action, mind, speech, which is served by the alms.That very same thing takes away from it, and therefore one should perform auspicious rituals.

Sloka: संस्कृतं भाषाणां जननी अस्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: Sanskrit is the mother of languages.

Sloka: देशाचारान्   समयाञ्चातिधर्मान्  बुभूषते यः स परावरज्ञः ।                            स यत्र तत्राभिगतः सदैव महाजनस्याधिपत्यं करोति ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who enjoys the country, customs and time of time is a knower of the superiority.Wherever he comes there he always rules the great men

Sloka: गृहेऽपि पज्चेन्द्रियनिग्रहः तपः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Even in the house, the five senses are restrained, and austerity is austerity.

Sloka: अतिवादं न प्रवदेत्र वादयेद् यो नाहतः प्रतिहन्यात्र घातयेत्।                            हन्तुं च यो नेच्छति पातकं वै तस्मै देवाः स्पृहयन्त्यागताय ॥
EnglishTranslation: He who does not speak excessive arguments here should kill him who is not struck and kills here.He who does not desire to kill the demigods, who is not seeking to kill the demigods, desiring to perform the sacrifice.

Sloka: जानन्नपि नरो दैवात्प्रकरोति विगर्हितम् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Even though he knows it, he is condemned by fate, even if he is condemned.

Sloka: शकटं पञ्चहस्तेन दशहस्तेन वाजिनम्।                                   हस्तिनं शतहस्तेन देशत्यागेन दुर्जनम्॥
EnglishTranslation: The cart with five hands with ten hands and a horse.The elephant with a hundred hands and by abandoning the country was a bad guy.

Sloka: छात्राणां धर्मः अध्ययनम्  अस्ति ॥
EnglishTranslation: The religion is the study of the students.

Sloka: क्रोधो हर्षश्च दर्पश्च ह्रीः स्तम्भो मान्यमानिता।                            यमर्थान् नापकर्षन्ति स वै पण्डित उच्यते ॥
EnglishTranslation: Anger, joy, pride, shyness, column, respected.A person who does not pull the objects of the material world is called a learned man.

Sloka: मूर्खशिष्योपदेशेन दुष्टास्त्रीभरणेन च।                           दुःखितैः सम्प्रयोगेण पण्डितोऽप्यवसीदति॥
EnglishTranslation: By the advice of a fool and a disciple of a wicked womanEven a wise man is depressed by the pain of the suffering.

Sloka: सुखं च दुःखं च भवाभवौ च लाभालाभौ मरणं जीवितं च।                            पर्यायशः सर्वमेते स्पृशन्ति तस्माद् धीरो न हृष्येत्र शोचेत् ॥
EnglishTranslation: Happiness and pain and birth, gain and loss, death and life.All these are touched by the alternation, so the patient should not grieve for the rejoice.

Sloka: नात्यन्तं सरलेन भाव्यं गत्वा पश्य वनस्थलीम्।                                 छिद्यन्ते सरलास्तत्र कुब्जास्तिष्ठन्ति पादपाः॥
EnglishTranslation: Not too simple, go and look at the forest.The hunchbacks are cut down and the trees remain there.

Sloka: ब्राह्मणं ब्राह्मणो वेद भर्ता वेद स्त्रियं तथा।                            अमात्यं नृपतिर्वेद राजा राजानमेव च॥
EnglishTranslation: A Brahmin is a Brahmin, a Brahmin, a husband and a woman and a woman.The king and the king also know the king's ministers

Sloka: जले तैलं खले गुह्यं पात्रे दानं मनागपि ।                                    प्राज्ञे शास्त्रं स्वयं याति विस्तारे वस्तुशक्तितः॥
EnglishTranslation: Oil in water is a secret in the vessel, and in a vessel, charity is also in the mind.In the wise, the scripture itself goes by the power of the object in expansion.

Sloka: शोकः शौर्यपकर्षणः ॥
EnglishTranslation: Grief is the removal of courage.
